attributes.action: Save BBC THREE from being taken off the air
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC are proposing to pull the plug on BBC THREE from being aired anywhere apart from online to save money.

This is a cut towards the TV Licence payers of a channel that is much loved by many people. This is the only BBC channel that has great value to the young British population and many more.

Please help in stopping this cut and to show that this channel is much apart of people's lives as a main form of Tv entertainment. Not a side Channel with a hand full of people watching.

rejection.details: This is an operational matter for the BBC.
